game.name: Cola Tycoon
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Cola Tycoon is an economic sandbox in which you invent iconic cola recipes, build industrial-era factories, and launch marketing campaigns to dominate the 19th-century drink market. Experiment with formulas, adapt to market shifts, and shape the industry one bottle at a time.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Cola Tycoon is an economic sandbox in which you invent iconic cola recipes, build industrial-era factories, and launch marketing campaigns to dominate the 19th-century drink market. Experiment with formulas, adapt to market shifts, and shape the industry one bottle at a time.
